column5: With the hardwater knocking on everyones door this time of year, be careful, and wait till its safe to go with the transportation you are out there with.  A local man went through the water this year and they are continueing searching for him, but please be safe and dont be statistic...if you have to question it...dont go.
I couldn't believe when I read that. Not even froze all the way across. Quite sad.
